title: Firecracker Shrimp
notes: Pretty rich, shrimp dont take long to cook, 1-2 min
instructions: ix together the mayonnaise, sweet chili sauce, sriracha, and salt and set aside
In a deep pan, heat enough oil to cover the shrimp to about 350 degrees
Coat the shrimp in cornstarch and fry about 2 minutes Fry in small batches and do not overcrowd the pan
Toss the fried shrimp in the sauce
Put the greens in a bowl, top with the shrimp, and garnish with the green onions
